1_12mXeWWrpRSTvSc2ofvfgsgsNgDfR5obAZ.body: i quite like gnome 3 - everything works as it should, and I have controls that just work and some non linux guru can use. (friends etc...) but only with sddm. gdm and lightdm are just utter garbage. (with sddm i have no crash issues and the ram usage is sooo much lower.)
